DOC.criteria: 1 . Are dispositioned receive radiation curative intent nasopharyngeal , oropharyngeal , hypopharyngeal , laryngeal , unknown primary cancer cervical metastasis . 2 . Are stage IIIVB oropharyngeal laryngeal 3 . Are stage IIVB hypopharyngeal nasopharyngeal 4 . At least 18 year age 1 . Have cancer diagnosis , except nonmelanoma skin cancer 2 . Had treatment previous head neck cancer radiation head neck 3 . Have history previous head neck surgery ( exclude biopsy and/or tonsillectomy and/or tracheotomy ) 4 . Have current oropharyngeal dysphagia unrelated cancer diagnosis ( e.g. , dysphagia due underlie neurogenic disorder ) 5 . Have dispositioned receive proton therapy .
